inicio.bio: I'm a fullstack developer specializing in the MERN stack, focusing on the frontend using React.js. Additionally, I offer freelancing services with WordPress and Elementor, whether it's a complex React.js project or a fast, optimized WordPress website, I'm here to deliver solutions that really work.

sobre.h5: I am available to collaborate on web projects
sobre.p: Born in 2001, I am a front-end developer passionate about transforming ideas into digital reality. With a positive mindset, I am committed to constantly improving my skills.
xpInfo: As a freelancer at Workana, I offer professional services in the area of â€‹â€‹web development with 1 year of experience mainly in Wordpress (Elementor). I work with dedication and commitment to meet the needs of each client, always seeking excellence in the final result.
Current front-end developer for a digital marketing team called 'ANF', 'The new Phase'. I built many different pages, used different UI/UX strategies, to make the landing pages highly convertible.

I was responsible for building a personalized business card service using the powerful WordPress Elementor plugin. With advanced design skills and knowledge of Elementor, I created attractive and functional layouts that helped our clients stand out in the digital world. I had the opportunity to expand my expertise in digital marketing and traffic management through Facebook Ads.
sobre.altPic: Photo of Renzi Fidele in passport format
